select NVL(TRUNC(sum(work_accmlt_tm)), 0) tmh, NVL(TRUNC((sum(work_accmlt_tm) - TRUNC(sum(work_accmlt_tm)))*60), 0) tmm, sum(work_accmlt_tm)*3600 - TRUNC(sum(work_accmlt_tm))*3600 - TRUNC((sum(work_accmlt_tm) - TRUNC(sum(work_accmlt_tm)))*60)*60 tms from (SELECT to_char(a.tm, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as days, a.empno, to_char(a.tm, 'HH24:MI') st_time, (SELECT to_char(b.tm, 'HH24:MI') et_time FROM tb_work b WHERE 1=1 AND b.empno = a.empno AND b.RCORD_CODE = 'D102' and to_char(a.tm, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(b.tm, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) as et_time , TRUNC((TO_DATE( (SELECT to_char(b.tm, 'HH24:MI') et_time FROM tb_work b WHERE 1=1 AND b.empno = a.empno AND b.RCORD_CODE = 'D102' and to_char(a.tm, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(b.tm, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ), 'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(to_char(a.tm, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI')) * 24, 2) as work_accmlt_tm,
a.rcord_code
FROM tb_work a WHERE 1=1 AND empno = #{empNo} AND a.RCORD_CODE = 'D101' AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D')+1, 'YYYY/MM/DD') < TM AND TM <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D')+7, 'YYYY/MM/DD'))
